name: UURAGE ScenarioEditor
tagline: The UURAGE Scenario Editor allows designers to create and edit dialogue scenarios using a web browser.
body:
# Scenario Editor

The UURAGE Scenario Editor is a web application component for editing dialogue scenarios using the [Utrecht University Dialogue Scenario Language](https://uudsl.github.io/scenario/).

# RAGE Project

Learn more about the [RAGE project](http://rageproject.eu/).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
